elements.name: lvngRootText
elements.html: (lvngRootText.p)We're not asking for your last name, so we have no way to connect you with any of your private data. We believe you're more likely to help us if you feel safe. Click the links below to learn about how your privacy is protected and what we'll be doing with this survey information.

elements.name: lvngRootInfoPrivacy
elements.html: (lvngRootInfoPrivacy)About your privacy

elements.name: lvngRootInfoYourData
elements.html: (lvngRootInfoYourData)How will we be using your information?

elements.name: lvngRootUserText
elements.html:
(lvngRootUserText.p)For verification purposes, we'll contact a random sample of survey particpants, so you may or may not get a message from us. If you're concerned about providing your email address, feel free to use your Facebook account name so we can contact you via Facebook Messenger if need be.

Your Facebook account name is the part after the Facebook URL. Example: https://www.facebook.com/your.account.name

With your consent, we may also contact you to talk in more detail about your experience with LP.
